title: Sell Wine
metaDescription: Sell your fine wine collection to Proof Cellars. We buy Bordeaux, Burgundy, Napa cult wines, and more. Direct offers with no consignment fees.
heroSubhead: We buy fine wine directly - from single bottles to full cellars.
introParagraph: Whether you have a few bottles of sought-after Burgundy or a full cellar of Bordeaux and Napa wines, we provide direct offers with no consignment fees. Our straightforward process: submit photos and details, receive an offer, and get paid after we receive and verify your wine.
whatWeBuy: Bordeaux first growths and classified estates
Burgundy from premier and grand cru vineyards
Napa Valley cult wines (Screaming Eagle, Harlan, etc.)
Italian fine wines (Barolo, Brunello, Super Tuscans)
Rare and collectible wines from other regions
whatWeDoNotBuy: Wine with visible seepage or heat damage
Bottles with extremely low fill levels
Items we cannot legally purchase in your state
conditionNotes: Wine condition is critical. Fill level should be appropriate for the wine's age. Capsules should be intact without signs of seepage. Labels should be legible, though age-appropriate wear is expected for older vintages. Storage history matters - wines stored in temperature-controlled environments are preferred. We may ask about storage conditions for valuable bottles.
pricingFactors: Current market demand and auction results
